channel.title: 4.2 Serving with Docker :: Deploy TensorFlow model on AWS with EC2 and Docker
channel.description: In order to serve the model, you will need Docker installed on the server. Since EC2 instance doesnâ€™t come with Docker pre-installed, you will need to install it manually. Install Docker on EC2 Run the following commands to install Docker on EC2. Update the packages: sudo yum update -y Install Docker: sudo yum install docker -y Start the Docker service: sudo service docker start Serving Depending on the model you are serving, you can pull the corresponding TensorFlow Serving Docker image.
